ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: My wealth has been of no use to me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Of no use was even my wealth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: My riches have not availed me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Our wealth is of no benefit to us
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “My wealth did not in the least benefit me.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: My wealth has not availed me;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: My wealth has availed me nothing:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: My wealth has not availed me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: My wealth hath not availed me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: My wealth has been of no use to me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: My riches have: availed me not;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: My wealth did not avail me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Of no profit to me has been my wealth!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: My wealth has not availed me,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My wealth has not helped me a thing
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: My wealth has not availed me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:28] My wealth has not availed me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (My wealth) which I had amassed in the life of the world (hath not availed me) from Allah's chastisement,
